item.title: Hello, Agents
item.author: artem@example.com (Artem B)
item.description: Welcome to the refreshed blog powered by Hugo and the Congo theme. This seed post verifies the CI-driven deployment path and demonstrates how Markdown-only content flows into the site. Feel free to replace it once you publish your first real article.
